name: biodynamic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to biodynamics (= a particular type of organic farming or plant growing), or produced according to its principles: Biodynamic farming includes consulting a calendar on the phases of the moon and the alignment of planets. They sell a range of organic and biodynamic wines.
More examplesFewer examplesOur products contain only biodynamic, organic ingredients sourced from suppliers who honour holistic principles.Theirs was one of the first vineyards in the nation to be certified as sustainable, organic, and biodynamic. In biodynamic gardening, we are very aware of the cosmic rhythms, and plant things just before the full moon.biodynamic practices such as spreading nettle tea in the vineyardsThe biodynamic calendar often calls for working at night or on weekends.The aim of the biodynamic farmer is to create balance and harmony between plants, animals, human beings, and the soil.
